title: Calories in Pop Tarts
meta_description: Learn calories in pop tarts with a full nutrition breakdown per pastry, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for different flavors or prep.
assumptions: Standard frosted strawberry Kellogg's Pop-Tart (38 g), untoasted, as packaged; values similar across fruit flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, toasting, and toppings. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Pop Tart contains about 200 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Pop Tart?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 calories for a standard frosted variety.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Pop Tarts?
faqs.a: About 37 g carbs per Pop Tart, including 17 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are Pop Tarts high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one Pop Tart has around 170 mg sodium.

faqs.q: How many calories in two Pop Tarts?
faqs.a: Roughly 400 calories for a full serving of two pastries.

faqs.q: Do different flavors change calories in Pop Tarts?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at 190-210 kcal each; check labels for specifics.
